runes.name: Electrocute
runes.shortDesc: Hitting a champion with 3 separate attacks or abilities in 3s deals bonus adaptive damage.
runes.longDesc: Hitting a champion with 3 separate attacks or abilities within @WindowDuration@s deals bonus <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_AdaptiveDmg'><font color='#48C4B7'>adaptive damage</font>.Damage: @DamageBase@ - @DamageMax@ (+@BonusADRatio.-1@ bonus AD, +@APRatio.-1@ AP) damage.Cooldown: @Cooldown@ - @CooldownMin@s<hr></hr>'We called them the Thunderlords, for to speak of their lightning was to invite disaster.'

runes.name: Predator
runes.shortDesc: Add an active effect to your boots that grants a large boost of and causes your next attack or ability to deal bonus adaptive damage.
runes.longDesc: Enchants your boots with the active effect '<font color='#c60300'>{{perk_displayname_KSLycanthropy}}</font>.'{{ game_itemmod_bloodmoonboots }}

runes.name: Dark Harvest
runes.shortDesc: Champions, large minions, and large monsters drop soul essence on death. Touch souls to absorb them and deal bonus adaptive damage on your next attack based on total soul essence collected.
runes.longDesc: Champions, large minions, and large monsters drop soul essence on death. Collect souls to become <font color='#c60300'>Soul Charged</font>. Your next attack on a champion or structure consumes <font color='#c60300'>Soul Charged</font> to deal bonus <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_AdaptiveDmg'><font color='#48C4B7'>adaptive damage</font>.<font color='#c60300'>Soul Charged</font> lasts @ONHDuration@s, increased to @ONHDurationLong@s after collecting @SoulsRequiredForIncreasedDuration@ soul essence.Bonus damage: @DamageMin@ - @DamageMax@ (+<scaleAD>@ADRatio.2@ bonus AD</scaleAD>) (+<scaleAP>@APRatio.1@ AP</scaleAP>) + soul essence collected.<rules>Champions - @champstacks@ soul essence.Monsters - @monsterstacks@ soul essence.Minions - @minionstacks@ soul essence.</rules>

runes.name: Cheap Shot
runes.shortDesc: Deal bonus true damage to enemy champions with impaired movement or actions.
runes.longDesc: Damaging champions with impaired movement or actions deals @DamageIncMin@ - @DamageIncMax@ bonus true damage (based on level).Cooldown: @Cooldown@s<rules>Activates on damage occurring after the impairment.</rules>

runes.name: Taste of Blood
runes.shortDesc: Heal when you damage an enemy champion.
runes.longDesc: Heal when you damage an enemy champion.Healing: @HealAmount@-@HealAmountMax@ (+@ADRatio.-1@ bonus AD, +@APRatio.-1@ AP) health (based on level)Cooldown: @Cooldown@s

runes.name: Sudden Impact
runes.shortDesc: Gain a burst of Lethality and Magic Penetration after using a dash, leap, blink, teleport, or when leaving stealth.
runes.longDesc: After exiting stealth or using a dash, leap, blink, or teleport, dealing any damage to a champion grants you @BonusLethality.0@ Lethality and @BonusMpen.0@ Magic Penetration for @Duration@s.Cooldown: @Cooldown@s

runes.name: Zombie Ward
runes.shortDesc: After killing a ward, a friendly Zombie Ward is raised in its place. When your wards expire, they also reanimate as Zombie Wards.
runes.longDesc: After killing a ward, a friendly Zombie Ward is raised in its place. Additionally, when your wards expire, they reanimate as Zombie Wards.Zombie Wards are visible, last for @WardDuration@s and don't count towards your ward limit.

runes.name: Ghost Poro
runes.shortDesc: When you enter brush, a poro appears. It will stay behind to give you vision.
runes.longDesc: Enter a brush to summon a poro after a brief channel. The poro will stay behind to give you vision until you summon a new one.If an enemy enters brush with a poro in it, they scare it away, putting {{ perk_displayname_ViciousPoro }} on a @Cooldown@s cooldown.Poro channel is interrupted if you take damage.

runes.name: Eyeball Collection
runes.shortDesc: Collect eyeballs for champion and ward takedowns. Gain permanent AD or AP, adaptive for each eyeball plus bonus upon collection completion.
runes.longDesc: Collect eyeballs for champion and ward takedowns. Gain {{ perk_subtext_AdaptiveForce }}, per eyeball collected. Upon completing your collection at @MaxEyeballs@ eyeballs, additionally gain {{ perk_subtext_AdaptiveForce_EyeballCollection }}.Collect @StacksPerTakedown@ eyeballs per champion kill, @StacksPerAssist@ per assist, and @StacksPerWard@ per ward takedown.

runes.name: Ravenous Hunter
runes.shortDesc: Unique takedowns grant permanent healing from ability damage.
runes.longDesc: Heal for a percentage of the damage dealt by your abilities.Healing: @StartingOmnivamp*100@% + @OmnivampPerStack*100@% per Bounty Hunter stack. Earn a Bounty Hunter stack the first time you get a takedown on each enemy champion.<rules>Healing reduced to one third for Area of Effect abilities.</rules>

runes.name: Ingenious Hunter
runes.shortDesc: Unique takedowns grant permanent Active Item CDR (includes Trinkets).
runes.longDesc: Gain @StartingActiveItemCDR.0*100@% Active Item CDR plus an additional @ActiveItemCDRPerStack.0*100@% per Bounty Hunter stack (includes Trinkets).Earn a Bounty Hunter stack the first time you get a takedown on each enemy champion.

runes.name: Relentless Hunter
runes.shortDesc: Unique takedowns grant permanent out of combat MS.
runes.longDesc: Gain @StartingOOCMS@ out of combat Movement Speed plus @OOCMS.0@ per Bounty Hunter stack.Earn a Bounty Hunter stack the first time you get a takedown on each enemy champion.

runes.name: Unsealed Spellbook
runes.shortDesc: Exchange Summoner Shards at the shop to change your Summoner Spells during game. Your Summoner Spells have reduced cooldowns.
runes.longDesc: Gain a Summoner Shard at @ShardFirstMinutes@ min and another every @ShardRechargeMinutes@ min after (Max @Maxshards@ shards).While near the shop, you can exchange @ShardCost@ Summoner Shard to replace a Summoner Spell with a different one. Additionally, your Summoner Spell Cooldowns are reduced by @SummonerCDR.0*100@%.<rules>Smite: Buying Smite won't grant access to Smite itemsYou cannot have two of the same Summoner Spell</rules>

runes.name: Glacial Augment
runes.shortDesc: Your first attack against an enemy champion slows them (per unit cooldown). Slowing champions with active items shoots a freeze ray at them, creating a lingering slow zone.
runes.longDesc:
Basic attacking a champion slows them for @SlowDuration.0@s. The slow increases in strength over its duration.
  • Ranged: Ranged attacks slow by up to @SlowAmountBase.0*-100@% - @SlowAmountMax.0*-100@%
  • Melee: Melee attacks slow by up to @SlowAmountBaseMelee.0*-100@% - @SlowAmountMaxMelee.0*-100@%
    • Slowing a champion with active items shoots a freeze ray through them, freezing the nearby ground for @SlowZoneDuration@s, slowing all units inside by @SlowZoneSlow*-100@%.Cooldown: @UnitCDBase@-@UnitCD16@s per unit

runes.name: Kleptomancy
runes.shortDesc: After using an ability, your next attack will grant bonus gold if used on a champion. There's a chance you'll also gain a consumable.
runes.longDesc: After using an ability, your next attack will grant bonus gold if used on a champion. There's a chance you'll also gain a consumable.

runes.name: Hextech Flashtraption
runes.shortDesc: While Flash is on cooldown it is replaced by Hexflash. Hexflash: Channel, then blink to a new location.
runes.longDesc: While Flash is on cooldown it is replaced by Hexflash.Hexflash: Channel for @ChannelDuration@s to blink to a new location.Cooldown: @CooldownTime@s. Goes on a @ChampionCombatCooldown@s cooldown when you enter champion combat.

runes.name: Biscuit Delivery
runes.shortDesc: Gain a free Biscuit every 3 min, until 12 min. Consuming a Biscuit permanently increases your max mana and restores health and mana.
runes.longDesc: Biscuit Delivery: Gain a {{game_item_displayname_2010}} every @BiscuitMinuteInterval@ mins, until @SwapOverMinute@ min.Biscuits restore @HealthHealPercent.0*100@% of your missing health and mana. Consuming any Biscuit increases your mana cap by @PermanentMana@ mana permanently. Manaless: Champions without mana restore @HealthHealPercentManaless.0*100@% missing health instead.

runes.name: Perfect Timing
runes.shortDesc: Gain a free Stopwatch. Stopwatch has a one time use Stasis effect.
runes.longDesc: Start the game with a {{ game_item_displayname_2419 }} that transforms into a {{ game_item_displayname_2420 }} after @InitialCooldown.0@ min. {{ game_item_displayname_2420 }} has a one time use Stasis effect.Reduces the cooldown of {{ game_item_displayname_3157 }}, {{ game_item_displayname_3026 }}, and {{ game_item_displayname_3193 }} by @PercentGAZhonyasCDR.0*100@%.

runes.name: Magical Footwear
runes.shortDesc: You get free boots at 10 min but you cannot buy boots before then. Each takedown you get makes your boots come 30s sooner.
runes.longDesc: You get free {{game_item_displayname_2422}} at @GiveBootsAtMinute@ min, but you cannot buy boots before then. For each takedown you acquire the boots @SecondsSoonerPerTakedown@s sooner.{{game_item_displayname_2422}} give you an additional +@AdditionalMovementSpeed@ Movement Speed and upgrade for 50 gold less.

runes.name: Future's Market
runes.shortDesc: You can enter debt to buy items.
runes.longDesc: You can enter debt to buy items. The amount you can borrow increases over time.Lending Fee: @ExcessCostPenaltyFlat@ gold

runes.name: Minion Dematerializer
runes.shortDesc: Start the game with 6 Minion Dematerializers. Killing minions with the item gives permanent bonus damage vs. that minion type.
runes.longDesc: Start the game with @GainedMinionKillers@ {{game_item_displayname_2403}}s that kill and absorb lane minions instantly. {{game_item_displayname_2403}}s are on cooldown for the first @InitialCooldown@s of the game.Absorbing a minion increases your damage by +@DamageBonusForAnyAbsorbed.0*100@% against that type of minion permanently, and an extra +@DamageBonusPerAdditionalAbsorbed.0*100@% for each additional minion of that type absorbed.

runes.name: Cosmic Insight
runes.shortDesc: +5% CDR  +5% Max CDR  +5% Summoner Spell CDR  +5% Item CDR
runes.longDesc: +@CDR*100@% CDR+@CDR*100@% Max CDR+@CDR*100@% Summoner Spell CDR+@CDR*100@% Item CDR

runes.name: Approach Velocity
runes.shortDesc: Bonus MS towards nearby ally champions that are movement impaired or enemy champions that you impair.
runes.longDesc: Gain @MovementSpeedPercentBonus.0*100@% Movement Speed towards nearby ally champions that are movement impaired or enemy champions that you impair. Range: @ActivationDistance@

runes.name: Celestial Body
runes.shortDesc: +100 Health permanently  -10% damage to champions and monsters until 10 min
runes.longDesc: +@HealthBonus@ Health permanently-@ChampionDamagePenalty*100@% damage to champions and monsters until @EndTime@ min<hr></hr>'The greatest legends live on in the stars.' —Daphna the Dreamer

runes.name: Press the Attack
runes.shortDesc: Hitting an enemy champion 3 consecutive times makes them vulnerable, dealing bonus damage and causing them to take more damage from all sources for 6s.
runes.longDesc: Hitting an enemy champion with @HitsRequired@ consecutive basic attacks deals @MinDamage@ - @MaxDamage@ bonus <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_AdaptiveDmg'><font color='#48C4B7'>adaptive damage</font> (based on level) and makes them vulnerable, increasing the damage they take by @AmpPotencySelf.0*100@% from all sources for @AmpDuration@s.

runes.name: Lethal Tempo
runes.shortDesc: 1.5s after damaging a champion gain a large amount of Attack Speed. Lethal Tempo allows you to temporarily exceed the attack speed limit.
runes.longDesc: @LeadInDelay.1@s after damaging a champion gain @AttackSpeedMin*100@ - @AttackSpeedMax*100@% Attack Speed (based on level) for @AttackSpeedBuffDurationMin@s. Attacking a champion extends the effect to @AttackSpeedBuffDurationMax@s.Cooldown: @Cooldown@s{{perk_displayname_FlowofBattle}} allows you to temporarily exceed the attack speed limit.

runes.name: Fleet Footwork
runes.shortDesc: Attacking and moving builds Energy stacks. At 100 stacks, your next attack heals you and grants increased MS.
runes.longDesc: Attacking and moving builds Energy stacks. At 100 stacks, your next attack is Energized.Energized attacks heal you for @HealBase@ - @HealMax@ (+@HealBonusADRatio.-1@ Bonus AD, +@HealAPRatio.-1@ AP) and grant +@MSBuff*100@% movement speed for @MSDuration.0@s.<rules>Healing is @MinionHealMod*100@% as effective when used on a minion.Healing is increased by @HealCritMod*100@% of your critical damage modifier when triggered by a critical hit.</rules>

runes.name: Overheal
runes.shortDesc: Excess healing on you becomes a shield.
runes.longDesc: Excess healing on you becomes a shield, for up to @ShieldCapRatio.0*100@% of your total health + @MaxBaseShieldCap@.Shield is built up from @ShieldGenerationRateSelf.0*100@% of excess self-healing, or @ShieldGenerationRateOtherMax.0*100@% of excess healing from allies.

runes.name: Triumph
runes.shortDesc: Takedowns restore 15% of your missing health and grant an additional 25 gold.
runes.longDesc: Takedowns restore @MissingHealthRestored.0*100@% of your missing health and grant an additional @BonusGold@ gold. <hr></hr>'The most dangerous game brings the greatest glory.' —Noxian Reckoner

runes.name: Presence of Mind
runes.shortDesc: For 5s after gaining a level or takedown any mana you spend is fully restored.
runes.longDesc: For @BuffDuration@s after gaining a level or takedown any mana you spend is fully restored.

runes.name: Legend: Alacrity
runes.shortDesc: Takedowns on enemies grant permanent Attack Speed.
runes.longDesc: Gain @AttackSpeedBase*100@% attack speed plus an additional @AttackSpeedPerStack*100@% for every Legend stack (max @MaxLegendStacks@ stacks).Earn progress toward Legend stacks for every champion takedown, epic monster takedown, large monster kill, and minion kill.

runes.name: Legend: Tenacity
runes.shortDesc: Takedowns on enemies grant permanent Tenacity.
runes.longDesc: Gain @TenacityBase*100@% tenacity plus an additional @TenacityPerStack*100@% for every Legend stack (max @MaxLegendStacks@ stacks).Earn progress toward Legend stacks for every champion takedown, epic monster takedown, large monster kill, and minion kill.

runes.name: Legend: Bloodline
runes.shortDesc: Takedowns on enemies grant permanent Lifesteal.
runes.longDesc: Gain @LifeStealPerStack*100@% life steal for every Legend stack (max @MaxLegendStacks@ stacks).Earn progress toward Legend stacks for every champion takedown, epic monster takedown, large monster kill, and minion kill.

runes.name: Coup de Grace
runes.shortDesc: Deal more damage to low health enemy champions.
runes.longDesc: Deal @BonusPercentDamage.0 *100@% more damage to champions who have less than @EnemyHealthPercentageThreshold*100@% health.Additionally, takedowns on champions grant {{ perk_subtext_AdaptiveForce }} for @Duration@s.

runes.name: Cut Down
runes.shortDesc: Deal more damage to champions with more max health than you.
runes.longDesc: Deal @MinBonusDamagePercent.0*100@% more damage to champions with @MinHealthDifference@ more max health than you, increasing to @MaxBonusDamagePercent.0*100@% at @MaxHealthDifference@ more max health.

runes.name: Last Stand
runes.shortDesc: Deal more damage to champions while you are low on health.
runes.longDesc: Deal @MinBonusDamagePercent.0*100@% - @MaxBonusDamagePercent.0*100@% increased damage to champions while you are below @HealthThresholdStart.0*100@% health. Max damage gained at @HealthThresholdEnd.0*100@% health.

runes.name: Grasp of the Undying
runes.shortDesc: Every 4s your next attack on a champion deals bonus magic damage, heals you, and permanently increases your health.
runes.longDesc:
Every @TriggerTime@s in combat, your next basic attack on a champion will:
  • Deal bonus magic damage equal to @PercentHealthDamage.0@% of your max health
  • Heal you for @PercentHealthHeal*100@% of your max health
  • Permanently increase your health by @MaxHealthPerProc@
    • Ranged Champions: Damage and healing are halved and gain @RangedHealthPerProc@ permanent health instead.

runes.name: Aftershock
runes.shortDesc: After immobilizing an enemy champion gain defenses and later deal a burst of adaptive damage around you.
runes.longDesc: After immobilizing an enemy champion, increase your Armor and Magic Resist by @FlatResists@ + @ResistInc.0*100@% for @DelayBeforeBurst.1@s. Then explode, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies.Damage: @StartingBaseDamage@ - @MaxBaseDamage@ (+@HealthRatio.1@% of your maximum health)Cooldown: @Cooldown@s

runes.name: Guardian
runes.shortDesc: Guard allies you cast spells on and those that are very nearby. If you or a guarded ally would take damage, you're both hasted and granted a shield.
runes.longDesc: {{ perk_shared_desc_KSBuddyShield }}Cooldown: @Cooldown@sShield: @ShieldBase@ - @ShieldMax@ +(<scaleAP>@APRatio.-1@ AP</scaleAP>) + (<scalehealth>+@HPRatio.0*100@% bonus health</scalehealth>).Haste: +@Haste*100@% Movement Speed.

runes.name: Unflinching
runes.shortDesc: After casting a Summoner Spell, gain Tenacity and Slow Resistance for a short duration. Additionally, gain Tenacity and Slow Resistance for each Summoner Spell on cooldown.
runes.longDesc: After casting a Summoner Spell, gain @BonusTenacity*100@% Tenacity and Slow Resistance for @BuffDuration@s. Additionally, gain @PersistTenacity*100@% Tenacity and Slow Resistance for each Summoner Spell on cooldown.

runes.name: Demolish
runes.shortDesc: Charge up a powerful attack against a tower while near it.
runes.longDesc: Charge up a powerful attack against a tower over @TotalSiegeTime@s, while within @DistanceToTower@ range of it. The charged attack deals @OutputDamagePerStack@ (+@MaxHealthPercentDamage.0 * 100@% of your max health) bonus physical damage.Cooldown: @CooldownSeconds@s

runes.name: Font of Life
runes.shortDesc: Impairing the movement of an enemy champion marks them. Your allies heal when attacking champions you've marked.
runes.longDesc: Impairing the movement of an enemy champion marks them for @MarkDuration@s.Ally champions who attack marked enemies heal for @FlatHealAmount@ + @HealthRatio.-1 * 100@% of your max health over @HealDuration@s.

runes.name: Iron Skin
runes.shortDesc: Gain +5 Armor. Heals, including consumables, increase your Armor by 5% temporarily.
runes.longDesc: Gain +@ArmorBase@ Armor. Heal effects from consumables, heals for at least @FlatHealThreshold@ health and shields increase your Armor by @TotalExtraArmor*100@% for @EvolveArmorDuration@s.

runes.name: Mirror Shell
runes.shortDesc: Gain +5 Magic Resist. Heals, including consumables, increase your Magic Resist by 5% temporarily.
runes.longDesc: Gain +@MRBase@ Magic Resist. Heal effects from consumables, heals for at least @FlatHealThreshold@ health and shields increase your Magic Resist by @EvolveBonusMR*100@% for @EvolveShellDuration@s.

runes.name: Conditioning
runes.shortDesc: After 10 min gain +8 Armor and +8 Magic Resist and increase your Armor and Magic Resist by 5%.
runes.longDesc: {{ perk_short_desc_NemFighter }}

runes.name: Overgrowth
runes.shortDesc: Gain additional permanent max health when minions or monsters die near you.
runes.longDesc: Permanently gain @MaxHealthRatioPerTier*100@% maximum health for every @UnitsPerTier@ monsters or enemy minions that die near you.

runes.name: Revitalize
runes.shortDesc: Heals and shields you cast or receive are 5% stronger and increased by an additional 10% on low health targets.
runes.longDesc: Heals and shields you cast or receive are @StandardAmp.0@% stronger and increased by an additional @ExtraAmp.0@% on targets below @HealthCutoff.0@% health.

runes.name: Second Wind
runes.shortDesc: After taking damage from an enemy champion heal back some missing health over time.
runes.longDesc: After taking damage from an enemy champion, heal for @RegenPercentMax.0*100@% of your missing health +@RegenFlat.0@ over @RegenSeconds@s.

runes.name: Summon Aery
runes.shortDesc: Your attacks and abilities send Aery to a target, damaging enemies or shielding allies.
runes.longDesc: Your attacks and abilities send Aery to a target, damaging enemy champions or shielding allies.Damage: @DamageBase@ - @DamageMax@ based on level (+<scaleAP>@DamageAPRatio.-1@ AP</scaleAP> and +<scaleAD>@DamageADRatio.-1@ bonus AD</scaleAD>)Shield: @ShieldBase@ - @ShieldMax@ based on level (+<scaleAP>@ShieldRatio.-1@ AP</scaleAP> and +<scaleAD>@ShieldRatioAD.-1@ bonus AD</scaleAD>) Aery cannot be sent out again until she returns to you.

runes.name: Arcane Comet
runes.shortDesc: Damaging a champion with an ability hurls a damaging comet at their location.
runes.longDesc: Damaging a champion with an ability hurls a comet at their location, or, if Arcane Comet is on cooldown, reduces its remaining cooldown.<lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_AdaptiveDmg'><font color='#48C4B7'>Adaptive Damage</font>: @DamageBase@ - @DamageMax@ based on level (<scaleAP>+@APRatio.-1@ AP</scaleAP> and <scaleAD>+@ADRatio.-1@ bonus AD</scaleAD>)Cooldown: @RechargeTime@ - @RechargeTimeMin@s<rules>Cooldown Reduction:Single Target: @PercentRefund*100@%.Area of Effect: @AoEPercentRefund*100@%.Damage over Time: @DotPercentRefund*100@%.</rules>

runes.name: Phase Rush
runes.shortDesc: Hitting an enemy champion with 3 separate attacks or abilities grants a burst of MS.
runes.longDesc: Hitting an enemy champion with 3 attacks or separate abilities within @Window@s grants @HasteBase*100@ - @HasteMax*100@% Movement Speed based on level and @SlowResist*100@% Slow Resistance.Duration: @Duration@sCooldown: @Cooldown@s

runes.name: Nullifying Orb
runes.shortDesc: Gain a magic damage shield when taken to low health by magic damage.
runes.longDesc: When you take magic damage that would reduce your Health below @PercHealthTrigger.0*100@%, gain a shield that absorbs @ShieldMin@ - @ShieldMax@ magic damage based on level (<scaleAP>+@APRatio.-1@ AP</scaleAP> and <scaleAD>+@ADRatio.-1@ bonus AD</scaleAD>) for @ShieldDuration@s.Cooldown: @Cooldown@s

runes.name: Manaflow Band
runes.shortDesc: Periodically your next ability used has its mana or energy cost refunded and restores some of your missing mana or energy.
runes.longDesc: Every @Cooldown.0@s, your next ability used has its mana or energy cost refunded, and restores @MPToRestoreRatio.0*100@% of your missing mana or energy.

runes.name: The Ultimate Hat
runes.shortDesc: Your ultimate's cooldown is reduced. Each time you cast your ultimate, its cooldown is further reduced.
runes.longDesc: Your ultimate's cooldown is reduced by @StartingCDR@%. Each time you cast your ultimate, its cooldown is further reduced by @CDChunkPerStack@%. Stacks up to @MaxStacks@ times.

runes.name: Transcendence
runes.shortDesc: Gain 10% CDR when you reach level 10. Excess CDR becomes AP or AD, adaptive.
runes.longDesc: Gain @MaxCDR*100@% CDR when you reach level @LevelToTurnOn@.Each percent of CDR exceeding the CDR limit is converted to {{ perk_subtext_AdaptiveForce }}.

runes.name: Celerity
runes.shortDesc: Gain 4% extra MS. Gain extra AP or AD, adaptive based on your bonus MS.
runes.longDesc: Gain @PercentMS.0@% increased Movement Speed and add @PercentOfMOvespeedAsPrimaryStat.0@% of your Bonus Movement Speed to your AP or AD, <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Adaptive'><font color='#48C4B7'>adaptive</font>.

runes.name: Absolute Focus
runes.shortDesc: While above 70% health, gain extra adaptive damage.
runes.longDesc: While above @HealthPercent*100@% health, gain {{ perk_subtext_AdaptiveForce_Max }} (based on level).

runes.name: Scorch
runes.shortDesc: Your first ability hit every 20s burns champions.
runes.longDesc: Your next ability hit sets champions on fire dealing @damage@ - @damagemax@ bonus magic damage based on level after @dotduration@s.Cooldown: @BurnlockoutDuration@s

runes.name: Waterwalking
runes.shortDesc: Gain MS and AP or AD, adaptive in the river.
runes.longDesc: Gain @MovementSpeed@ Movement Speed and {{ perk_subtext_AdaptiveForce_Max }} (based on level) when in the river.<hr></hr>May you be as swift as the rushing river and agile as a startled Rift Scuttler.

runes.name: Gathering Storm
runes.shortDesc: Gain increasing amounts of AD or AP, adaptive over the course of the game.
runes.longDesc: Every @UpdateAfterMinutes@ min gain AP or AD, <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Adaptive'><font color='#48C4B7'>adaptive</font>.10 min: + 8 AP or 5 AD 20 min: + 24 AP or 14 AD30 min: + 48 AP or 29 AD40 min: + 80 AP or 48 AD50 min: + 120 AP or 72 AD60 min: + 168 AP or 101 ADetc...
